---
title: "LaTeX Table Tests"
author: "Benjamin Nutter"
date: "October 1, 2015"
output: pdf_document
header-includes:
 - \usepackage[dvipsnames]{xcolor}
---

```{r}
library(pixiedust)
fit <- lm(mpg ~ qsec + factor(am) + wt * factor(gear), data = mtcars)
x <- dust(fit) %>%
  sprinkle(cols = 2:4, round = 2) %>%
  sprinkle(cols = 5, fn = quote(pvalString(value))) %>%
  sprinkle(cols = 3, bold = TRUE, font_color = "rgb(218 112 214, .75)") %>%
  sprinkle(cols = 2, italic = TRUE, bold = TRUE) %>%
  sprinkle(cols = 1, rows = 2, halign = "right") %>%
  sprinkle(cols = 4, font_size = 15, font_size_units = "%") %>%
  sprinkle_colnames(estimate = "Estimate", p.value = "P") %>%
  sprinkle_print_method("latex")
```

```{r}
x
```

```{r}
dust(anova(fit)) %>%
  sprinkle(round = 3, na_string = "N/A") %>%
  sprinkle_print_method("latex")
```
